review_data.title: Top Sushi, mieser Service
review_data.content: Die Qualität der Speisen ist sehr gut und die Kreativität selbst der Verpackungen ist top, was den recht hohen Preis...More

review_data.title: Good sushi for covid times
review_data.content: Due to Covid went for takeout: great sushi (tuna/truffle and spicy tuna very recommendable), Asahi beer, friendly staff and decent speed. Became a member of their loyalty program straight away. Price in line with offering. Back next week to try some other ones.

review_data.title: Excellent service
review_data.content: I went there twice and the sushis are of good quality (like in every sushi shop) but what makes it special is the waiters ! They are extremely friendly and they are willing tu put an extra effort to make the moment enjoyable :) thank...More

review_data.title: Goof fusion Sushi
review_data.content: Good fusion sushi rolls. Try out the Foe Gras roll and Dragon roll. Pretty good food for good price. Worth a try

review_data.title: Bester Sushi Laden von Zürich.
review_data.content: Bester Sushi Laden von Zürich. Mein absoluter Favorit!! Kann ich jedem empfehlen der Sushi gerne zu Hause geniesst!

review_data.title: Very good!!
review_data.content: Best sushi in town with seasonal specials! Best for take away, even though they have a couple of tables at the shop.

review_data.title: Average
